entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sandy Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
